extends Object

Methods for sending email messages required by the program.

Field Detail

subDelimiter

protected static final String subDelimiter
Substitution Delimiter. Wrap 'variables' in your Subject and Body with this string and they will be replaced before the message is sent.

See Also:
#substituteVars(String, Map)}, Constant Field Values
